text: Caitlyn Jenner may be revealing The Secrets of My Life in her new memoir, but here’s one she hasn’t detailed: The transgender star is breast obsessed and “goes to great lengths to keep hers looking good,” says a source. Cait, who didn’t undergo full sex reassignment surgery until January but has had two breast augmentations since 2015, “slathers on firming cream at night, and she sleeps in a special bra that separates her boobs, so she won’t get cleavage wrinkles,” says the insider. Worried about her implants hardening, “she massages her breasts twice a day, and every six weeks she sees a doctor for laser resurfacing.” Though she traded up to D cups last fall, “Cait’s talking about getting them redone again. The bigger the better, she figures!”
title: Caitlyn Jenner Is Feeling Herself ... Literally! The Reason She Loves Breast Massages

meta_data.description: A sources claims that Caitlyn Jenner puts in extra effort to maintain the shape and form her her body, the reality star goes through a strict regime.
